manifest.install: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `ims_yc_admin` ( `admin_id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `uniacid` int(11) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '公众号id', `hotelid` int(11) DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '酒店id', `uid` int(11) DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '会员id', `from_user` varchar(100) NOT NULL COMMENT '微信标识用于发模板消息', `addtime` int(11) DEFAULT '0', `msg_flag` tinyint(1) DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '0=>发送通知,1=>不发送通知', PRIMARY KEY (`admin_id`) ) ENGINE=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8; CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `ims_yc_adv` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `uniacid` int(11) DEFAULT '0', `advname` varchar(50) DEFAULT '', `link` varchar(255) NOT NULL DEFAULT '', `thumb` varchar(255) DEFAULT '', `displayorder` int(11) DEFAULT '0', `enabled` int(11) DEFAULT '0', `type` tinyint(1) DEFAULT '1', `add_time` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', PRIMARY KEY (`id`), KEY `indx_uniacid` (`uniacid`), KEY `indx_enabled` (`enabled`), KEY `indx_displayorder` (`displayorder`) ) ENGINE=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8; CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `ims_yc_hotel` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `uniacid` int(11) NOT NULL, `listorder` int(5) NOT NULL, `title` char(200) NOT NULL, `thumb` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `thumbs` text NOT NULL, `level` int(2) NOT NULL, `show_device` text NOT NULL, `phone` char(50) NOT NULL, `hexiaomima` varchar(50) NOT NULL, `integral` int(11) DEFAULT '0', `address` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `province` char(50) NOT NULL, `city` char(50) NOT NULL, `district` char(50) NOT NULL, `lng` char(100) NOT NULL, `lat` char(100) NOT NULL, `description` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `content` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `traffic` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `sales` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `status` tinyint(1) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8; CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `ims_yc_hotel_comment` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `uniacid` int(11) DEFAULT '0', `hotelid` int(11) NOT NULL, `orderid` int(11) NOT NULL, `point` int(2) NOT NULL, `content` text NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8; CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `ims_yc_hotel_manager` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `uniacid` int(11) DEFAULT '0', `hotelid` int(11) NOT NULL, `status` int(1) DEFAULT '0', PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8; CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `ims_yc_hotel_member_level` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `uniacid` int(11) NOT NULL, `level` int(11) DEFAULT '0', `levelname` varchar(50) DEFAULT '', `ordermoney` decimal(10,2) DEFAULT '0.00', `ordercount` int(10) DEFAULT '0', `discount` decimal(10,2) DEFAULT '0.00', `enabled` tinyint(3) DEFAULT '0', PRIMARY KEY (`id`), KEY `idx_uniacid` (`uniacid`) ) ENGINE=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8; CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `ims_yc_hotel_room` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `hotelid` int(11) DEFAULT '0', `uniacid` int(11) DEFAULT '0', `title` varchar(255) DEFAULT '', `thumb` varchar(255) DEFAULT '', `mprice` int(10) DEFAULT '0', `thumbs` text, `device` text, `area` varchar(255) DEFAULT '', `floor` varchar(255) DEFAULT '', `smoke` varchar(255) DEFAULT '', `bed` varchar(255) DEFAULT '', `persons` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `bedadd` varchar(30) DEFAULT '', `status` int(11) DEFAULT '0', `isshow` int(11) DEFAULT '0', `sales` text, `displayorder` int(11) DEFAULT '0', `wifit` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `score` int(11) DEFAULT '0', `sortid` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `isrecommand` tinyint(3) DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '1首页推荐', `isbest` tinyint(3) DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '1特惠', `ischosen` tinyint(3) DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '1精选', `istime` int(11) DEFAULT '0', `timestart` int(11) DEFAULT '0', `timeend` int(11) DEFAULT '0', `oprice` decimal(10,2) DEFAULT NULL, `credit` decimal(10,2) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '评分', `addresstag` text COMMENT '位置标签', `hot` tinyint(3) DEFAULT '1' COMMENT '1热水', `cold` tinyint(3) DEFAULT '1' COMMENT '1空调', `type` tinyint(2) DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '预约房间状态', `book_time` int(11) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '设置不可预约时间', PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8; CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `ims_yc_hotel_setting` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `uniacid` int(11) NOT NULL, `is_notice` int(1) NOT NULL, `tpluser` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `istplnotice` int(1) NOT NULL, `tplneworder` varchar(50) NOT NULL, `xindan` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `ddfk` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `jdyd` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `gtuifang` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `tuid` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `tkzhi` varchar(255) NOT NULL DEFAULT '', `is_daidian` int(1) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `is_mihua_mall` tinyint(1) DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '1开启米花商城', PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8; CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `ims_yc_room_order` ( `order_id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `goods_name` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `uniacid` int(11) NOT NULL, `order_on` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `openid` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `hotelid` int(11) NOT NULL, `roomid` int(11) NOT NULL, `mid` int(11) NOT NULL, `xtime` char(50) NOT NULL, `order_name` char(50) NOT NULL, `phone` char(50) NOT NULL, `yu_legth` int(3) NOT NULL, `sintdate` int(20) NOT NULL, `sjsintdate` int(20) DEFAULT NULL, `soutdate` int(20) NOT NULL, `sjsoutdate` int(20) DEFAULT NULL, `totalcpice` smallint(5) unsigned NOT NULL, `order_status` int(1) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '订单状态 0 已下单 1付款 2已到店 3已离店4进店付款', `ordertime` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, `mode` char(50) NOT NULL, `commentstatus` tinyint(3) DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '0可评论', `need` varchar(50) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '用户需求', PRIMARY KEY (`order_id`) ) ENGINE=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8; CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `ims_yc_roommoney` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `uniacid` int(11) DEFAULT '0', `hotelid` int(11) NOT NULL, `roomid` int(11) NOT NULL, `motitle` varchar(100) NOT NULL, `oprice` smallint(5) unsigned NOT NULL, `cprice` smallint(5) unsigned NOT NULL, `hprice` smallint(5) unsigned DEFAULT NULL, `status` int(1) DEFAULT '0', PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8; CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `ims_yc_shop_goods` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `uniacid` int(11) NOT NULL, `typename` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `goods_name` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `goods_pic` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `number` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL, `goods_yprice` decimal(10,2) unsigned DEFAULT NULL, `goods_xprice` decimal(10,2) unsigned DEFAULT NULL, `goods_images` varchar(500) NOT NULL, `goods_info` text NOT NULL, `goods_sort` tinyint(1) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8; CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `ims_yc_shop_order` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `uniacid` int(10) NOT NULL, `openid` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `ordersn` varchar(50) NOT NULL, `goodsid` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL, `fee` decimal(10,2) NOT NULL, `order_num` smallint(5) NOT NULL, `order_time` int(10) NOT NULL, `order_status` tinyint(1) unsigned DEFAULT '0', `pay_time` int(10) NOT NULL, `username` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `userphone` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `useraddress` varchar(255) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;
